Description.Text: Located in the old city center, Sultanahmet, Celal Sultan Hotel gives you the advantage of being in walking distance to many historical attractions such as Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Hippodrome, Underground Cistern, Grand Bazaar, Spice Bazaar Istanbul Ataturk International Airport is 18 km away from hotel. Relax yourself Celal Sultan Hotel's Lobby after a busy day. The hotel offers coffee and tea service as well as any local and international drinks. Lobby bar offers you a tiny atmosphere where you can meet friends and chat. Dining is another experience at Celal Sultan Hotel's Ata Restaurant. You may find specialties of Turkish and Ottoman Cuisine as well as many examples of international cuisines. The hotel don't recommend chance to taste the difference. The hotel also offers Library, Lobby, Reception, Dry cleaning, PC Internet and Terrace Restaurant.

At the heart of the old city Istanbul... Located in the old city center, Sultanahmet, Celal Sultan Hotel gives you the advantage of being in walking distance to many historical attractions such as Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Hippodrome, Underground Cistern, Grand Bazaar, Spice Bazaar Istanbul Ataturk International Airport is 18 km away from the Hotel.

Standard Single Room - Standard Single Room offers twin bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, non-smoking rooms, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, telephone, mini bar, color TV, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, valet service, hairdryer, heating, internet access, radio, kettle, LCD TV, tea and coffee making facilities. Single : All single rooms have individual heat and A/C. They are decorated in relaxing earth tones. Standard single rooms have direct dial telephone, airconditioning, private bathroom, hairdryer, satellite LCD TV, minibar, tea&coffee maker,free wireless internet access and double glazing windows, some rooms with balcony and 24 hours room service. Daily Room Rates (All taxes and buffet breakfast are included)
Standard Double/Twin Room - Standard Double/Twin Room offers 2 twin beds or French Bed with air conditioning, alarm clock, non-smoking rooms, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, telephone, mini bar, color TV, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, valet service, hairdryer, heating, internet access, radio, kettle, LCD TV, tea and coffee making facilities. Standard double rooms have direct dial telephone, airconditioning, private bathroom, hairdryer, satellite LCD TV, minibar, tea&coffee maker,free wireless internet access and double glazing windows, some rooms with balcony and 24 hours room service. Daily Room Rates (All taxes and buffet breakfast are included
Standard Triple Room - Standard Triple Room offers one double bed and one twin bed or three twin beds with air conditioning, alarm clock, non-smoking rooms, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, telephone, mini bar, color TV, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, valet service, hairdryer, heating, internet access, radio, kettle, LCD TV, tea and coffee making facilities. Standard triplerooms have direct dial telephone, airconditioning, private bathroom, hairdryer, satellite LCD TV, minibar, tea&coffee maker,free wireless internet access and double glazing windows, some rooms with balcony and 24 hours room service. Daily Room Rates (All taxes and buffet breakfast are included)
